description: Rada Miskovic, convinced that exposing the BCI's fatal flaw is necessary, broadcasts evidence of the hidden score-reversal protocol to underground and activist channels, warning that the system is about to be irreparably compromised.

Rada breaks from state narrative, using her media platform to reveal the existence of the BCI fail-safe, challenging the Council to explain how such a catastrophic protocol was allowed. Public speculation and anxiety spike.

The score-flip protocol is triggered across the city. Overnight, compliant citizens lose access to services and jobs, while previously marginalized individuals gain sudden privileges. Daily life is thrown into chaos as trust in BCI collapses.

Council factions hold emergency sessions, descending into open accusations of sabotage. Directorate blames Innovators, while Harmonists push for manual overrides to restore order. Oksana, Rada, and Lenart each attempt to decipher Halden’s last updates.

With order breaking down, citizens form new alliances across former social barriers. Mass protests and public forums erupt, demanding the Council dismantle the BCI and establish transparent governance, as Council authority visibly weakens.
